function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Virus binding to host cells via lock and key mechanism","Impact":"Facilitates virus infection and replication","Mitigation":"Developing inhibitors to block receptor binding","Technologies":"Inhibitor-based agents, machine learning for modeling","People":"Individuals at risk of virus infection","Owner":"Scientists, pharmaceutical companies"},{"Description":"Lack of experimental verification for predicted virus protein structures","Impact":"Uncertain accuracy of predictions and potential misdirection in drug development","Mitigation":"Conducting experimental verification of predictions","Technologies":"Experimental testing, biological assays","People":"Scientists, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, scientific laboratories"},{"Description":"Use of AI and machine learning for modeling virus structures","Impact":"Potential inaccuracies in modeling and predictions","Mitigation":"Validation of model predictions through experimental methods","Technologies":"Deep learning algorithms, experimental testing","People":"Scientists, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, scientific laboratories"}]}
